00016     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_SEND, OnBnClickedSend )
00017     ON_CBN_SELCHANGE(IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_MODE, OnCbnSelchangeSpeedLimitCboMode)

00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg
00027     (
00028     CWnd                * aParent,
00029     FmiApplicationLayer & aCom
00030     )
00031     : CDialog( IDD_SPEED_ALERTS, aParent )
00032     , mCom( aCom )
00033     , mMode( 0 )
00034     , mTimeOver( 10 )
00035     , mTimeUnder( 10 )
00036     , mAlertUser( TRUE )
00037     , mThreshold( 0.0 )
00038 {
00039 }

00046 }

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 void CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::DoDataExchange
00053     (
00054     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00055     )
00056 {
00057     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00058 
00059     // Bind to needed edit boxes
00060     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_OVER, mTimeOver );
00061     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_UNDER, mTimeUnder );
00062     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_THRESHOLD, mThreshold );
00063 
00064     // make sure time over and under values fits into one byte
00065     DDV_MinMaxInt( aDataExchange, mTimeOver, 0x0, 0xff );
00066     DDV_MinMaxInt( aDataExchange, mTimeUnder, 0x0, 0xff );
00067 
00068     // DDX will round to nearest integer, make sure to update the fields
00069     CString text;
00070     CEdit*  pEdit;
00071     text.Format( _T("%d"), mTimeOver );
00072     pEdit = (CEdit *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_OVER );
00073     pEdit->SetWindowText( text );
00074 
00075     text.Format( _T("%d"), mTimeUnder );
00076     pEdit = (CEdit *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_UNDER );
00077     pEdit->SetWindowText( text );
00078 
00079     // Resolve Mode
00080     // Note: Mode is enumerated with speed_limit_alert_mode_type
00081     mMode = (uint8)
00082         ( (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_MODE ) )->GetCurSel();
00083 
00084     // Resolve AlertUser
00085     mAlertUser = !(boolean)
00086         ( (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_ALERT_USER ) )->GetCurSel();
00087 }
00088 
00089 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 void CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::EnableFields
00094     (
00095     bool aValue
00096     )
00097 {
00098     GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_OVER )->EnableWindow( aValue );
00099     GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_TIME_UNDER )->EnableWindow( aValue );
00100     GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_ALERT_USER )->EnableWindow( aValue );
00101     GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_THRESHOLD )->EnableWindow( aValue );
00102 }

00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 void CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::OnBnClickedSend()
00109 {
00110     UpdateData();
00111 
00112     mCom.sendSetSpeedLimitAlerts
00113         ( mMode, mTimeOver, mTimeUnder, mAlertUser, mThreshold );
00114 }
00115 
00116 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 void CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::OnCbnSelchangeSpeedLimitCboMode()
00121 {
00122     UpdateData();
00123     switch( mMode )
00124     {
00125     case SPEED_LIMIT_MODE_CAR:
00126         EnableFields( TRUE );
00127         break;
00128     case SPEED_LIMIT_MODE_OFF:
00129         EnableFields( FALSE );
00130         break;
00131     case SPEED_LIMIT_MODE_TRUCK:
00132         EnableFields( TRUE );
00133         break;
00134     default:
00135         break;
00136     }
00137 }

00144 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 afx_msg LRESULT CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::OnEventSpeedLimitSetResultFromClient
00146     (
00147     WPARAM aResultCode,
00148     LPARAM
00149     )
00150 {
00151     SetResult( static_cast<uint8>( aResultCode ) );
00152 
00153     return 0;
00154 }

00156 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 BOOL CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::OnInitDialog()
00162 {
00163     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00164 
00165     ( (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_MODE ) )->SetCurSel( 0 );
00166     ( (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_CBO_ALERT_USER ) )->SetCurSel( 0 );
00167 
00168     return TRUE;
00169 }

00171 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 void CSpeedLimitAlertsDlg::SetResult
00177     (
00178     uint8 aResultCode
00179     )
00180 {
00181     CString resultCodeText;
00182     switch( aResultCode )
00183     {
00184     case SPEED_LIMIT_RESULT_SUCCESS:
00185         resultCodeText.Format( _T("Success") );
00186         break;
00187     case SPEED_LIMIT_RESULT_ERROR:
00188         resultCodeText.Format( _T("Error") );
00189         break;
00190     case SPEED_LIMIT_RESULT_MODE_UNSUPPORTED:
00191         resultCodeText.Format( _T("Unsupported") );
00192         break;
00193     default:
00194         resultCodeText.Format( _T("Unknown") );
00195         break;
00196     }
00197 
00198     CString text;
00199     CEdit * pEdit;
00200     text.Format( _T("%d - %s"), aResultCode, resultCodeText );
00201     pEdit = (CEdit *)GetDlgItem( IDC_SPEED_LIMIT_EDIT_RESULT );
00202     pEdit->SetWindowText( text );
00203 }
